channel.title: Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site
channel.description: Recent content on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site

item.description: A paper has been published as a first paper on RSURFI Reducing sulfur to improve thermal embrittlement in electrodeposited nickel using citric acid A. Watanabe, Y. Takigawa Results in Surfaces and Interfaces, 1, 1000001 (2020).（査読有り） doi: 10.1016/j.rsurfi.2020.100001
